title: Academic Recommendation: Software Engineering
organization: French-Azerbaijani University (UFAZ) / Federal University of Uberl√¢ndia (UFU)
description: Professional academic recommendation from Prof. Igor S. Peretta, PhD. The endorsement highlights a perfect score of 100/100 in the Software Engineering course (2025), a rare achievement attained through exceptional mastery of software lifecycle, architecture, and design principles. This result significantly contributed to a stellar 98% GPA in 2024, ranking me at the very top of the Computer Science program. The professor emphasizes advanced analytical skills and the ability to grasp complex engineering topics with precision.
